text: The rivalry between [Eddie Hearn ](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/eddie-hearn/)and Simon Jordan is not new, and none of them are showing any signs of slowing down. The two have been out for each other throats because of their different opinions regarding boxing and integrity in sports. But the boiling point came in 2023 when the duo engaged in an hour-long debate on TalkSPORT talking about various things. Since then, the pair has been involved in constant back-and-forth online and Jordan has publicly criticized Hearn for his involvement with His Excellency Turki Alalshikh. But a new angle was added to this rivalry when Hearn claimed that the sports pundit ‚Äúbegged‚Äù for a meeting with His Excellency and Jordan hit back and called the Matchroom Promoter- a ‚ÄúFool.‚Äù None of them are ready to let even one word slide, as Hearn hit back and brutally warned Jordan. Jordan even questioned the integrity and ethics of Hearn and how he conducts business. Known for his outspokenness, Hearn retorted back in a furious nature and [defended his way of doing business](https://www.essentiallysports.com/boxing-news-eddie-hearn-brands-he-turki-alalshikh-critics-almost-borderline-racist-boxing-insider-rallies-in-support/) while challenging Jordan‚Äôs lack of knowledge of the boxing world. In the fans‚Äô eyes, Hearn was the clear winner of the argument, and according to the promoter, he won‚Äôt shy away from making another appearance at the talk show to teach Jordan some more. However, let‚Äôs get ready for some throwback. Jordan calls Hearn a ‚Äòfool‚Äô The latest chapter in this rivalry started when Jordan accused Hearn and [Frank Warren](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/frank-warren/) of ‚Äúbullying‚Äù Boxxer chief Ben Shalom during the [Anthony Joshua](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/anthony-joshua/) vs. [Daniel Dubois](https://www.essentiallysports.com/tag/daniel-dubois/) undercard fight. During the undercard fight, Hearn and Shalom got into a heated exchange, opening a window for Jordan to attack. Hearn and Warren both hit back at Jordan and the Matchroom Boxing promoter called the latter a ‚Äúrogue hero of controversy.‚Äù Hearn further clarified that Jordan asked for a meeting with HE Turki Alalshikh.
